Header.title: North Quabbin: We fix the CrowdStrike outage
Header.paragraph: We will come to you and fix computers affected by the CrowdStrike outage.

About.paragraph: Are you affected by the CrowdStrike outage and are located in North Quabbin? Please call us to fix it now!
